Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>There's no way he knows we're <clr:0000>disguising
ourselves as trees<clr:ffff> to ambush him.
He's done for!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:SurpriseS_00>You're kidding, right? <sp:5:1:0>Link is Zelda's
appointed swordsman!

He's always getting in our way every
chance he gets. The guy's a real pain.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But not for long. The Yiga is tightening its
net all over Hyrule. <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure we'll hear
news of his death any day now.
<snd:LaughS>Heh heh...<sp:5:0:0> He'll never expect that we're
<clr:0000>disguising ourselves as trees<clr:ffff> to ambush
him. He's done for!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm, nah... It wouldn't be any fun to kill
<clr:0000>Link <clr:ffff>right away...

Maybe I'll make him lug all this stuff to
<clr:0000>the Depths <clr:ffff>and back for me... Work him
till he kicks the bucket. That'll show him!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>The only way Link could ever beat Master
Kohga is with a cowardly surprise attack!<sp:0:4:0>If that's how he does things, we'll pay him
with a surprise attack of our own.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Argh, it never ends! How many times must
I go back and forth between the Depths
and the surface?!
Between this, that, and the other thing,
all of this is <clr:0000>Link<clr:ffff>'s fault!
